auth_failure.title: Holfuy API Authentication Failed
auth_failure.description:
The Holfuy API key is invalid or expired. Authentication failed with error code 401 or 403.

Please update your API key in the integration settings to restore functionality.

To update your API key:
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services
2. Find the Holfuy integration
3. Click Configure
4. Enter a valid API key

If you don't have an API key, visit https://api.holfuy.com/ for information on obtaining one.

station_inaccessible.title: Holfuy Station {station_id} is Inaccessible
station_inaccessible.description:
Station {station_id} is consistently returning errors or is not accessible with your current API key.

This may occur if:
- The station ID is incorrect
- The station is not included in your API key subscription
- The station is temporarily offline

To resolve this issue:
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services
2. Find the Holfuy integration
3. Click Configure
4. Remove or correct the problematic station ID

Note: Other stations may still be working correctly.

api_connection_failure.title: Holfuy API Connection Issues
api_connection_failure.description:
The Holfuy integration is experiencing persistent connection failures to the API.

Possible causes:
- Network connectivity issues
- Holfuy API service outage
- Firewall or network restrictions

The integration will continue to retry automatically with increasing intervals. Updates have been throttled to reduce load.

If the issue persists:
- Check your internet connection
- Verify the Holfuy API status at https://holfuy.com/
- Check Home Assistant logs for detailed error messages

This issue will automatically resolve when the API becomes accessible again.

invalid_response.title: Holfuy API Response Format Error
invalid_response.description:
The Holfuy API is returning data in an unexpected or invalid format that cannot be parsed.

This may indicate:
- Temporary API issues
- API changes or updates
- Station configuration problems

The integration will continue to retry automatically. If this issue persists:
- Check the Holfuy API status at https://holfuy.com/
- Review Home Assistant logs for specific error details
- Consider reporting the issue at https://github.com/stefanh12/holfuy/issues

This issue will automatically resolve when valid responses are received.
